resources.string: uma kwenzeka amanani amabili aziwa, kulula ukubala owesithathu ngokuya ngomthetho ka-Ohm:
* Izinsiza kusebenza\n TN-C - uhlelo lapho umqhubi wokuvikela ongathathi hlangothi nomqhubi osebenza ngokungathathi hlangothi behlanganiswa ngakunye kubude bawo bonke.
* Izinsiza kusebenza\n TN-S - uhlelo lapho umqhubi wokuzivikela ongathathi hlangothi nomqhubi wokusebenza ongathathi hlangothi behlukaniswa bonke ubude bayo.
* Izinsiza kusebenza\n TN-CS - uhlelo oluyingxenye lapho imisebenzi ye-conductor yokusebenza engavikelekile nengathathi hlangothi ihlanganiswe kumqhubi oyedwa, kusukela ekunikezelweni kwamandla.

* Izinsiza kusebenza\n IT - uhlelo lapho ukungathathi hlangothi kokuhlinzekwa kwamandla kuhlukaniswe nomhlaba noma kuncike kumadivayisi wokumelana okuphezulu, futhi izingxenye eziveziwe zokufakwa kukagesi zibekwe phansi.

* Izinsiza kusebenza\n TT - uhlelo lapho ukungathathi hlangothi kwamandla omuncu kugxilile khona, futhi izingxenye eziveziwe zokufakwa kukagesi zigxiliwe kusetshenziswa ithuluzi lokuzimela elizimele ngogesi kusuka kokungathathi hlangothi okuqinile komthombo.

Kubunjiniyela kagesi, umhlabathi noma umhlaba kuyindawo yokubhekiselwa kwisekethe kagesi lapho kukalwa khona imithamo, indlela ejwayelekile yokubuyela yamandla kagesi, noma ukuxhumana okuqondile ngokomzimba emhlabeni.

● T (Terra) = Ukuxhuma ngqo emhlabathini.\n ● Mina (Ukuzihlukanisa) = Akukho ukuxhumana nomhlabathi (noma ngabe kukhona impedance ephezulu)\n ● N (Okungathathi hlangothi) = Ukuxhuma ngqo kukhebula lokuhambisa ugesi elingathathi hlangothi (lapho le khebuli nayo isuselwa kunikezelo lwamandla)

Ukuxhumeka kwemikhono kwenziwa ngokusebenzisa imikhono ekhethekile, lapho kufakwa khona ucingo. Ukuqothulwa kwemikhono kwenziwa ngezihlungi ezikhethekile. Kuyadingeka ukuqinisekisa ukuthi umkhono ufana nobubanzi bocingo oluboshwe kulo. Imvamisa, impintshisi iba nokukhiya okukhethekile okusebenza lapho umkhono ubambeke ngokuphelele. Ngemuva kokuthi izintambo zicindezelwe, ziyafakwa bese zifakwa ebhokisini lokuhlangana.

Ibhulokhi yokugcina iyindlela elula kakhulu yokuxhuma izintambo eziningi. Siqukethe izindlu zepulasitiki ezinezixhumi zethusi ngaphakathi. Kungaba nama-pair ayi-12 noma ngaphezulu wokuxhuma. Uma udinga inani elincane, nquma okweqile ngommese.\n \t xhumo kufanele luhlolwe ngezikhathi ezithile futhi izikulufu ziqiniswe. Ngemuva kokuqinisa izikulufu, donsela ucingo ngalunye ukuze uqiniseke ukuthi lunamathele ngokuphephile.

Izixhumi ze-twist-on wire ziyindlela elula yokuxhuma izintambo ezincane, ezisetshenziselwa ukuxhuma izintambo zethusi eziningi, ezincane, eziqinile. Izintambo ezihlutshiwe zisontekile zihlanganiswa nekepisi.

Izikhumulo ezingenantambo ziyindlela elula kakhulu yokuxhuma. Imikhawulo yezintambo iyaphuculwa futhi ifakwe ku-terminal, lapho isiqeshana sentwasahlobo siyazilungisa.
 	 1. Izikhumulo zokuxhuma ezizisikayo zokuxhuma abaqhubi bethusi abanzima.
 	 2. Amatheminali angenantambo avumela ukuxhuma zombili izintambo zethusi eziguqukayo neziqinile.
 	 Suсh uxhumano kuthatha isikhathi esincane futhi ongenalo zidinga yesondlo okwengeziwe, kusukela isiphethu ekhethekile flat uvalwe ukucindezela bese kwamaphutha wire.
 	 Uma ama-terminals aqukethe okunamathiselwe kokuxhumana, angasetshenziswa ukuxhuma izintambo zombili zethusi ne-aluminium.
Ukushisela kuyindlela ethembeke kunazo zonke yokuxhuma izintambo. Izintambo zisontekile ndawonye bese zishiselwa.
Ukunamathisela, kanye ne-welding, futhi kuyindlela ethembekile yokuxhuma izintambo.

Amaphuzu wokuxhuma kwezintambo ayindawo enobungozi obukhethekile. Iningi lakho konke ukungasebenzi kahle nezingozi zenzeka ngqo koxhumana nabo nakuma-cable twists. Kufanele unake ngokukhethekile ukuxhumana kwezintambo.

Ukuhlukaniswa:
 - Ngohlobo nokulinganiswa kwamanje wesekethe omkhulu
 - Ngokwakhiwa
 - Ngesibalo sezigxobo zesifunda esikhulu
 - Ngokutholakala komkhawulo wamanje
 - Ngohlobo lokukhululwa (i-electromagnetic, thermal)
 - Ngesici sesikhathi samanje (B, C, D nabanye)

Isiphuli sesekhethi yiswishi esebenza ngogesi ezenzelwe ukuvikela isekethe kagesi emonakalweni odalwe yimanje eyeqile kusuka ekulayisheni ngokweqile noma isifunda esifushane. Umsebenzi wawo oyisisekelo ukuphazamisa ukuhamba kwamanje ngemuva kokutholwa kwephutha. Ngokungafani ne-fuse, esebenza kanye bese kufanele ithathelwe indawo, ikhefu lesekethe lingasetwa kabusha (kungaba ngesandla noma nge-othomathikhi) ukuqalisa ukusebenza okujwayelekile.

I-Residual yamanje Circuit Breaker ene-Over Current Protection ihlanganisa imisebenzi yamadivayisi amabili wokuvikela kwesinye - idivayisi yamanje eyinsalela kanye nekhefu lesifunda.\n \t R Ama-RCBOs asetshenziswa kakhulu ezinhlelweni lapho kunesidingo sokuhlanganisa ukuvikelwa kuma-overcurrents (overload and short-circuit) kanye nokuvikelwa kumisinga yokuvuza komhlaba.

Idivayisi yamanje esalayo ihlukaniswa:
 - Ngesibalo sezigxobo
 - Ngu zamanje ukalwe
 - Ngokwesimiso sokusebenza (ngogesi nange-electromechanical)
 - Ngokutholakala kokubambezeleka kwesikhathi sokuphendula
 - Ngohlobo lokuvuza kwamanje
Isibonelo sokudluliswa okuzenzakalelayo kwe-Reserve usebenzisa i-phase control relay

Idivayisi yamanje eyi-Residual (RCD) iyidivayisi yokushintsha othintana nayo eyenzelwe:
 ● Vikela abantu ekushayweni ugesi.
 ● Vikela izinto emlilweni uma kwenzeka kulimala ukufakwa kwentambo kagesi nezinto zikagesi.
 	 Uma kunomehluko kumisinga (umehluko wamanje) phakathi kwabaqhubi abaxhunywe kwi-RCD ngenxa yokuvuza komhlaba ngokuvalwa okonakele noma ngomzimba womuntu, idivayisi iyakuthinta lokhu futhi iyinqamula ngokushesha inethiwekhi.
I-RCD ene-40A yamanje elinganisiwe nokusetha i-30mA yamanje

Okwamanje okuvuza kuvela kuthintana nezingxenye ezibukhoma zokufakwa kukagesi. Ngalesi sikhathi, ubukhulu bemisinga edlula ku-transformer yamanje yephuliwe (i-current at the input ayilingani neyamanje ekuphumeni) futhi esifundeni sesibili se-transformer yamanje sivela njengamandla kagesi, anele edluliselwe ukusebenza. Ukudluliswa kusebenze indlela evula oxhumana nabo.

Isokhethi ye-lightbulb iyithuluzi elisekela ngemishini futhi linikeze ukuxhumana ngogesi kwesibani sikagesi esihambisanayo. Amasokhethi avumela ukuthi izibani zishintshwe ngokuphepha nangendlela elula (ukukhanyisa kabusha). Kunezindinganiso eziningi ezahlukahlukene zama-lampholders, kufaka phakathi izindinganiso zakuqala zama-facto namazinga wakamuva enziwe yizindikimba zamazinga ezahlukahlukene. Amazinga amaningi wakamuva ahambisana nohlelo lokufaka amakhodi jikelele lapho uhlobo lwesokhethi lubekwa khona ngohlamvu noma isifinyezo esilandelwa inombolo.

\t Akuzona zonke izibani ezidinga isokhethi. Isibonelo, ezinye izibani ezincanyana zinemikhombandlela yocingo efanelekile ukuxhuma ngqo kwizikulufa noma ezinye izintambo, futhi ezinye izibani ezibonisa ukukhanya zinikezela ngamathebula wokuxhuma wokuxhuma kagesi.

Amadivayisi wokuvikelwa aklanyelwe ukuvikela imishini kagesi ekuqhamukeni kwamandla. Zinciphisa ukweqiwa kwesikhashana, zigudlulela umfutho wamanje phansi futhi zinciphisa ubukhulu bevoltage yokuya ezingeni eliphephile ekufakweni kukagesi nemishini. Ama-SPD asetshenziswa kokubili ekwakhiweni komphakathi nasezikhungweni zezimboni.

\t I-voltage spike umcimbi odlulayo, ovame ukuhlala kuma-microseconds ayi-1 kuye kwangama-30, angafika ngaphezu kwama-volts ayi-1 000. Umbani oshaya ngentambo kagesi unganikeza izinkulungwane eziningi, kwesinye isikhathi ama-volts ayi-100,000 noma ngaphezulu. Imoto lapho icishiwe ingenza i-spike yama-volts ayi-1 000 noma ngaphezulu. Ama-spikes angalulaza ukufakwa kwentambo futhi aqede amadivayisi we-elekthronikhi afana namashaja webhethri, ama-modem nama-TV.\n \t Ukuqhuma kwesikhathi eside, imizuzwana ehlala njalo, imizuzu, noma amahora, okubangelwa ukwehluleka kwamandla okuguqula amandla njengokulahleka okungathathi hlangothi noma elinye iphutha lenkampani yamandla, akuvikelwa ngabavikeli besikhashana. Ama-surges wesikhathi eside angabhubhisa abavikeli esakhiweni sonke noma endaweni. Ngisho amashumi ama-millisecond angaba made ukwedlula umvikeli angakwazi ukuwaphatha. Ama-surges wesikhathi eside angahle aphathwe ngama-fuse nangokudluliswa kwamandla kagesi.\n \t Umvikeli wesikhashana odlulayo uzama ukukhawulela amandla kagesi ahlinzekwa kudivayisi kagesi ngokuvimba noma ngokunciphisa okwamanje ukunciphisa amandla wevolumu ngaphansi kombundu ophephile. Ukuvimba kwenziwa ngokusebenzisa ama-inductors okuvimbela ushintsho olungazelelwe lwamanje. Ukushoda kwenziwa ngezikhala ze-spark, amashubhu wokukhipha, ama-semiconductors wohlobo lwe-zener, nama-MOVs (i-Metal Oxide Varistors), konke okuqala ukuqhuba njengamanje lapho kufinyelelwe umkhawulo othile wamandla kagesi, noma ngama-capacitors avimbela ushintsho olungazelelwe lwamandla kagesi. Abanye abavikeli bokusebenzisa basebenzisa izinto eziningi.

\t Ukudluliswa kwe-Voltage kuyinhlanganisela yedivayisi yokuqapha amandla kagesi kagesi kanye nengxenye yamandla okokuxhuma umthwalo, ehlanganiswe kwelinye icala. Yenzelwe ukuqapha inani lamandla asethiwe, nokunqamula umthwalo uma weqa umkhawulo obekiwe, uma kwenzeka kuba nezingozi kwinethiwekhi kagesi.

\t inkomba yokujikeleza kwemoto, kufanele uqale uyimise ukubuyisela oxhumana naye uKM 1.2 noma uKM 2.2 esimweni esivame ukuvalwa. Laba oxhumana nabo basetshenziselwa ukuvimbela ama-short-circuit esigaba ngesigaba.
Iziguquli ze-Electromechanical amadivayisi aklanyelwe ukuguqula amandla kagesi abe amandla kagesi noma okuphambene nalokho. Bangaguqula futhi uhlobo olulodwa lwamandla kagesi lube olunye.
\t Ngokuya ngokuguqulwa kwamandla, imishini kagesi ihlukaniswa yaba:

Imoto kagesi iguqula amandla kagesi abe amandla kagesi. Inqubo ebuyela emuva yama-generator kagesi, ama-motor amaningi kagesi asebenza ngokuhlangana kwezinkundla zamagnetic kanye nabaqhubi abaphethe njengamanje ukukhiqiza amandla okujikeleza. Ama-motor nama-generator anokufana okuningi futhi izinhlobo eziningi zama-motors kagesi zingaqhutshwa njengama-generator, futhi okuphambene nalokho. Ama-motors kagesi atholakala kuzinhlelo zokusebenza ezahlukahlukene njengabalandeli bezimboni, abashayayo namaphampu, amathuluzi emishini, izinto zasendlini, amathuluzi kagesi, nama-disk drive.

I-Transformer iyidivayisi emile eguqula okushintshayo kwamanje kusuka ezingeni elilodwa lamandla kuya kwelinye (eliphakeme noma eliphansi), noma liye ezingeni elifanayo, ngaphandle kokushintsha imvamisa. I-transformer idlulisa amandla kagesi isuka kwesinye isifunda iye kwesinye ngokusebenzisa ama-conductor ahlanganiswe ngokungenayo — amakhoyili e-transformer. Amandla kagesi ahlukahlukene kukhetho lokuqala noma lokuqala enza ukuguquguquka okungafani kukazibuthe kumgogodla we-transformer futhi ngaleyo ndlela kube insimu kazibuthe ehlukahlukene ngokushaywa kwesibili. Le nsimu kazibuthe ehlukahlukene idonsa amandla e-electromotive ahlukahlukene (emf) noma \"voltage\" ekujikeni kwesibili. Lo mphumela ubizwa ngokuthi ukufakwa kokunye.

Ukuphepha kagesi uhlelo lwezinyathelo zenhlangano nezindlela zobuchwepheshe ezivimbela imiphumela eyingozi neyingozi kubasebenzi kusuka kumandla kagesi, i-arc kagesi, inkambu ye-electromagnetic nogesi we-static.\n \t Kubandakanya ezomthetho, ezenhlalo nezomnotho, ezenhlangano, ezobuchwepheshe, ezempilo, ezempilo, ezokuvikela, zokuvuselela kanye neminye imisebenzi.
Isigaba sokuvikelwa ekushayweni ugesi uhlelo lokuqokwa kwezindlela nezinga lokuphepha kagesi lapho usebenzisa imishini kagesi.

\t Ukuhlukaniswa komsebenzi kuphela okutholakalayo. Ukufakwa okungeziwe kwezingxenye zensimbi ezingahambisani nakho akunikeziwe. Ukwenza isisekelo akunikeziwe. Akukho okubonisa amandla ayingozi ezindlini noma kuzilawuli.
\t Cishe wonke amadivayisi kagesi emzimbeni wensimbi ongaqinile, vula amapuleti ashisayo avuthayo nezifudumezi, izigaxa zesilingi.

\t Ukuhlukaniswa komsebenzi kuphela okutholakalayo. Ukufakwa okungeziwe kwezingxenye zensimbi ezingahambisani nakho akunikeziwe. Ukugaya izinsimbi ezingezona ezamanje ezithwala insimbi kuqinisekiswa ngokuxhuma ucingo olukhethekile kuluphu womhlabathi noma ngokuxhumana okuqondile kwemishini kagesi kanye ne-loop yomhlaba. Iphoyinti lokuxhuma lomhlabathi likhonjiswa ngophawu lomhlabathi.
\t Amathuluzi emishini, ama-switchboards, izikhulisi ze-transformer, ama-cranes kujantshi wesitimela, i-tram, i-locomotive kagesi.
\t tIzinsimbi ezisontayo ezingezona ezamanje ziqinisekiswa ngokuxhuma ipulagi yedivayisi kusokhethi elikhethekile elinomuntu othintana naye.
\t Isipho sokufaka esiphindwe kabili noma esiqinisiwe. Ukusekelwa kweChassis akudingeki. Ipulagi ayinaye oxhumana naye oyisisekelo.
\t vacuum cleaner, i-TV, i-drill kagesi, isomisi sezinwele, isibani somgwaqo esivaliwe, itroli yebhasi.
\t Awekho amasekethe kagesi angaphezu kwe-42VDC noma i-36VAC.

\t Onke amadivayisi anikwe amandla webhethri angenawo ama-high-voltage circuits (imisakazo, abadlali abaphathekayo, amawashi, amalambu). Amadivayisi anokuphakelwa kwamandla wangaphandle (ama-scanner, ama-laptops). Okokugcina, ukuphepha kunqunywa yikhwalithi nezinga lokuvikelwa kokuphakelwa kwamandla.

\t Kuvunyelwe ukusetshenziswa kuphela emakamelweni ngaphandle kwengozi eyengeziwe kagesi, kanye nakumakhamera kagesi abiyelwe noma amakamelo lapho ukufinyelela kwabantu abangagunyaziwe kungavunyelwe khona. Uma kunokwenzeka, amadivayisi anjalo kufanele asuswe ekusebenzeni.
\t okumile, ukunyakaza okuncane ngaphakathi kobude bocingo lokufaka, ukufakwa kukagesi okuhamba ngojantshi. Ukusebenza ngaphandle kwesisekelo akuvunyelwe.
\t Uma kukhona ukuxhumana komhlaba, ukusetshenziswa akunqunyelwe (ngaphandle uma kuchazwe ngenye indlela kumanyuwali wokusebenza). Ngaphandle kwesisekelo - esifana nesigaba \"0\".

\t Akukhawulelwe, ngaphandle kwezimo zomswakama eziphezulu (ngaphezulu kwama-85%) wamadivayisi anesigaba sokuvikela esingaphansi kwe-IP65. Lapho kunezimo ezingezinhle ezivunyelwe ngokusetshenziswa okungenani kwensimbi eyodwa yokuvikela kagesi noma ngaphandle kokusebenzisa izinto zokuvikela zikagesi lapho zixhunywe nge-RCD noma lapho kutholwa kuphela isamukeli sikagesi esisodwa emthonjeni ohlukile.

● Isigaba esisodwa - lapho ucingo lwesigaba luxhunywe kokungathathi hlangothi. Amasekethe amancane anjalo avela kaningi.\n ● Izigaba ezimbili - lapho isigaba esisodwa sixhunywe kwesinye.\n ● Izigaba ezintathu - lapho izigaba ezintathu zixhunywe komunye nomunye ngasikhathi sinye. Lolu uhlobo oluyinkinga kakhulu lwesekethe elifushane.

Isifunda esifushane yisifunda sikagesi esivumela ukuthi ukuhamba kwamanje kuhambe ngendlela engahlosiwe engenayo noma impedance kagesi ephansi kakhulu. Lokhu kubangela ukugeleza kwamanje okugeleza ngokweqile ngesifunda.\n \t Uma kwenzeka isifunda esifushane, ukumelana kwisekethe kuyanyamalala, futhi amandla wamanje aqala ukwanda ngokungapheli, okuholela emiphumeleni emibi.\n \t Uma i-breaker circuit ifakiwe kulayini, kufanele icime umugqa ngokuyalelwa kokukhishwa kwe-electromagnetic.
Isetshenziswa ekufakweni kukagesi kuphela ngokushintshana kwamanje namandla kagesi kusuka ku-100 kuye ku-500 V. Kusetshenziselwa ukunquma isigaba.
Kusetshenziselwa ukukala i-voltage, yamanje, ukumelana, noma ukuqhubeka.
Izinhlobo eziningi, ziba ngcono. Kumele kube nesibambo esigaxekile neshaft.
Amathuluzi asebenza ngesandla afanelekile futhi ahlanganisiwe enzelwe ukubamba nokubamba.
Ithuluzi lokuxhuma ukuxhumana okuhlanganisiwe ngokuqinisa amabhawodi, amantongomane nezinye izingxenye. Kuyathandeka-ke ukuthi amawilo ahlukaniswe.
Ithuluzi lesandla elincane elishaywayo elenzelwa ukubethela esikhonkwaneni, thepha edanyeni, unamathisele ubakaki okhuphukayo.
Ithuluzi elinemisebenzi eminingi. Cishe awukho umsebenzi ophelele ngaphandle kwawo.
Inhloso eyinhloko - izintambo ezilumayo, izipikili, izikrini.
Kuyasiza ukucija imicu yocingo, ukulungisa izindawo ezingalingani.
Kunezinhlobo ezahlukahlukene zama-hacksaws: zensimbi, izinkuni, i-drywall. Sika ngokweqile, usike umgodi wokufaka.
Isebenziseka ukukala usayizi wezinto zomsebenzi, ubude bekhebula.
Kusetshenziswa izimbobo zokubhoboza isando, kubhalwa imisele, bese kugaywa. Inekhanda elisebenzayo lokunamathisela ama-drill nokunamathiselwe okuhlukahlukene.
Ilusizo emsebenzini omkhulu lapho udinga ukuqinisa izikhonkwane.
Ivumela ukubeka wonke amathuluzi adingekayo okusebenza ebhande

\t I-lux (lx) iyunithi ekhanyisiwe ekhanyisiwe ye-SI, elinganisa ukukhanya okukhanyayo endaweni yunithi ngayinye.Ilingana ne-lumen eyodwa ngemitha eyisikwele. Ku-photometry, lokhu kusetshenziswa njengesilinganiso sokuqina, njengoba kubonakala ngeso lomuntu, lokukhanya okushaya noma okudlula ngaphezulu.

\t Umuntu akakwazi ukuthola inani elithile leleveli yokukhanyisa ngaphandle kwezinsiza, ukuthola imininingwane enembile kusetshenziswa imitha ye-lux. Ukukhanya kwezindawo zokusebenza kanye nezakhiwo zemikhakha eyahlukahlukene yomsebenzi kumele kuhambisane nemithetho yombuso.

\t I-lumen (lm) iyunithi etholwe yi-SI yokukhanya okukhanyayo, isilinganiso senani eliphelele lokukhanya okubonakalayo okukhishwa ngumthombo ngeyunithi ngayinye yesikhathi. Ukukhanya okukhanyayo kwehlukile emandleni (i-radiant flux) kulokho kugeleza okukhazimulayo kufaka wonke amaza kagesi akhishwe, kuyilapho ukucucuza okukhanyayo kukalwa ngokuya ngemodeli (\"umsebenzi wokukhanya\") wokuzwela kweso lomuntu kuma-wavelengths ahlukahlukene. Ama-lumen ahlobene ne-lux ngokuthi i-lux eyodwa i-lumen eyodwa ngemitha eyisikwele.
\t Ukushisa kombala (kulinganiswa kuKelvin, K) - kuyisici senkambo yokuqina kwemisebe yomthombo wokukhanya njengomsebenzi wobude bebanga ebangeni elibonakalayo.

IMultimeter iyinsimbi yokulinganisa kagesi ehlanganisa imisebenzi eminingana yokukala kwiyunithi eyodwa. I-multimeter ejwayelekile ingalinganisa i-voltage, yamanje, nokumelana. Ama-multimeter we-Analog asebenzisa i-microammeter enesikhombi esihambayo ukubonisa ukufundwa. Ama-digital multimeter (i-DMM, i-DVOM) anokuboniswa kwezinombolo, futhi angakhombisa ibha yokuqhafaza emele inani elilinganisiwe. Ama-multimeter edijithali asebenzise ama-analog multimeters ukuthi asephelelwe yisikhathi, ngoba manje asezindleko eziphansi, ukucacisa okuphezulu, futhi anamandla ngokwengeziwe ngokomzimba.\n \t Qiniseka ukuthi ufunda imiyalo eze ne-multimeter yakho ngaphambi kokuyisebenzisa.

I-generator kagesi iyithuluzi eliguqula amandla kagesi abe ngamandla kagesi. Umshini ophehla ugesi uphoqa ama-electron ukuba ageleze ngesifunda sangaphandle sikagesi. Ifana ncamashí nepompo yamanzi, edala ukugeleza kwamanzi kepha engawakhi amanzi ngaphakathi. Umthombo wamandla kagesi, umgqugquzeli oyinhloko, kungaba injini yokubuyisela emuva noma ephendukayo, amanzi awela ngophephela noma isondo lamanzi, injini yomlilo yangaphakathi, i-turbine yomoya, i-crank yesandla, umoya ocindezelweyo noma yimuphi omunye umthombo wamandla kagesi.\n \t Izingxenye ezimbili eziyinhloko zomshini kagesi zingachazwa ngokusebenza ngomshini noma ngogesi. Ngokwama-mechanical, i-Rotor yingxenye ejikelezayo, kanti i-stator yingxenye emile yomshini kagesi. Ngamagama kagesi, ingalo iyinto ekhiqiza amandla futhi insimu iyinxenye kazibuthe womshini kagesi. Isikhali singaba ku-Rotor noma ku-stator. Amandla kazibuthe angahlinzekwa ngama-electromagnet noma odonsa abasebenza njalo abekwe ku-Rotor noma ku-stator. Ama-generator ahlukaniswa abe yizinhlobo ezimbili, ama-AC generator nama-DC generator.

Njengamanje, kunezinhlobo ezilandelayo zokukhiqiza ugesi:
 ● I-Hydropower - imboni esebenzisa amandla we-kinetic wokugeleza kwamanzi ukukhiqiza ugesi.
 ● Umkhakha wamandla kagesi ashisayo - imboni esebenzisa amandla okushisa avela emafutheni omlilo asafosili
 ● Amandla enuzi ayimboni lapho kukhishwa amandla okushisa ngenxa yokusabela kwenuzi ku-reactor yenuzi.
 ● Obunye ubunjiniyela bamandla:
 - Amandla elanga
 - Amandla omoya
 - Amandla we-geothermal (ukusetshenziswa kokushisa komhlaba)
 - Amandla e-Hydrogen
\t phakathi kwalesi sikimu nalesi esedlule ukuthi ukuze ushintshe indlela ojikeleza ngayo injini, awudingi ukucindezela inkinobho ethi \"Stop\" njalo.
Izinsimbi zokulinganisa zikagesi isigaba samadivayisi asetshenziselwa ukukala amanani kagesi ahlukahlukene.

I-Ammeter iyithuluzi lokulinganisa ama-amperes amanje (ama-microamperes, ama-milliamperes, ama-amperes noma ama-kiloamperes). I-ammeter ixhunywe ochungechungeni wesekethe kagesi, okwamanje kukalwa khona. Ukumelana kwangaphakathi kwe-ammeter kufanele kube kuncane ukuze kungathinti into engaphansi kokuhlolwa.
 	 Ukwengeza umkhawulo wokulinganisa, i-ammeter ifakwe i-shunt (ye-DC ne-AC), isiguquli samanje (se-AC kuphela) noma i-magnetic amplifier (yamasekethe e-DC).
 	 Ngokwakhiwa kwama-ammeters ahlukaniswe kwaba:
 ● Ama-Ammeters angenawo amasekhethi kagesi anenkomba yesikhombi
 ● Ama-ammeters anamasekhethi kagesi nokusebenzisa inkomba yesikhombi
 ● Ngesikhombi sedijithali

Ama-voltmeters we-Analog ahambisa isikhombisi esikalini ngokulingana namandla wesifunda; Ama-voltmeters edijithali anikeza ukuboniswa kwamanani we-voltage ngokusebenzisa isiguquli se-analog-to-digital. Ama-voltmeters enziwa ngezitayela ezahlukahlukene. Amathuluzi afakwe unomphela kuphaneli asetshenziselwa ukuqapha ama-generator noma ezinye izinto ezihleliwe. Izinsimbi eziphathekayo, ezijwayele ukufakwa ukukala futhi ukumelana njengamanje nge-multimeter, amathuluzi wokuhlola ajwayelekile asetshenziswa emsebenzini kagesi nowe-elekthronikhi.
 	 Ngokomthetho wokusebenza, ama-voltmeters ahlukaniswe aba:
 ● Electromechanical - magnetoelectric, electromagnetic, electrodynamic, electrostatic, rectifier, thermoelectric
 ● I-elekthronikhi - i-analog ne-digital
 Ngokuqokwa:
 ● Ukushintshana kwamanje
 ● Ukuqondisa kwamanje
 ● Ukuzwela ngezigaba
 ● Ukushaya kwenhliziyo
 ● Iyakhetha
 ● Okuvamile
 Ngokwakhiwa nangendlela yokufaka isicelo:
 ● I-switchboard
 ● Iyaphatheka
 ● Okumile
IVoltmeter iyithuluzi elisetshenziselwa ukukala umehluko wamandla kagesi phakathi kwamaphoyinti amabili kusekethe kagesi.

I-Ohmmeter iyithuluzi lokulinganisa lokunquma ukumelana nokusebenza kagesi. Imvamisa isilinganiso senziwa nge-current current, kepha amanye ama-ohmmeter kagesi angalinganisa ukushintshana kwamanje. Ama-ohmmeter ahlukile kumabanga wokumelana okulinganisiwe: ama-megohmmeters, ama-gigaohmmeters, ama-teraohmmeters, ama-milliohmmeters, ama-microohmmeters.

Ngokwakhiwa nangendlela yokufaka isicelo:
 ● I-switchboard
 ● Ilebhu
 ● Iyaphatheka
 Ngokomgomo wokusebenza:
 ● Magnetoelectric - ngemitha yamagnetoelectric noma i-magnetoelectric ratiometer (megohmmeters)
 ● I-elekthronikhi - i-analog noma idijithali
Imitha kagesi wumshini olinganisa inani lamandla kagesi asetshenziswa yinsimbi esebenza ngogesi.
● Ibanga lesilinganiso sokumelana\n ● Iphutha elivunyelwe noma isigaba sokunemba\n ● I-Voltage ezikhumulweni zensimbi

\t Izinsiza zikagesi zisebenzisa amamitha kagesi afakwe emagcekeni amakhasimende ngezinhloso zokukhokha nokuqapha. Zilinganiswa ngokujwayelekile kumayunithi wokukhokha, okuvame kakhulu ukuba yihora le-kilowatt (kWh). Imvamisa zifundwa kanye ngesikhathi ngasinye sokukhokha. \t\n Isibonelo: Isitofu sikagesi esinamandla angama-2.5 kW ngemizuzu engama-30 sisebenzisa igridi yamandla bese siguquka sibe ukushisa okungu-2.5 kW ∙ 0.5 h = 1.25 kW ∙ h.

Imitha ye-Clamp iyithuluzi lokulinganisa okukhona ngaphandle kokuphula isekethe futhi ngaphandle kokuxhumana nalo ngogesi.\n \t Umgomo wokusebenza kwamamitha wesimanjemanje wesigaxa ususelwa ekulinganisweni okuqondile kwamandla kazibuthe akhiqizwe yimanje ku-conductor ezungeze umqhubi esebenzisa inzwa yeHholo futhi ikuvumela ukuthi ulinganise isimo samanje sokuphikisana, kufaka phakathi samanje esiqondile.

● Kukalwa kwamanje ngaphandle kokuphula isekethe elilinganisiwe.
 ● Kungenzeka ukukala okulula kuma-high-voltage circuits (kufika ku-10 kV).
 ● Kungenzeka ukukala amandla wamanje aphezulu kakhulu (okuyinto engenakwenzeka ngokomzimba kuma-ammeters ajwayelekile, axhunywe ochungechungeni kwisekethe evulekile).
 ● Ukucinana kocingo.

● Isigaba sokunemba okuphansi (2.0 - 3.0).\n ● Ukuncika okuthile kokufundwayo endaweni yomqhubi ophethe njengamanje ewindini lesifunda likazibuthe loqinisa.\n ● Ukuhlanekezelwa kokufundwa kumamodeli angabizi kakhulu ngenxa yobukhona kuma-harmoniki aphezulu alinganisiwe futhi kusukela kuzinguquko kumvamisa wamanje olinganisiwe, ngoba idivayisi inika ukufundwa okulungile kuphela nge-sinusoidal yamanje (esinye sezizathu zalokhu ukusetshenziswa imitha uhlelo lwamagnetoelectric ngokulungiswa). Ezingxenyeni zesimanjemanje zobuchwepheshe lobu bubi bunxeshezelwa yisekethe noma isoftware.

Iziqalo zamagnetic amadivayisi kagesi asetshenziselwa ukulawula imithwalo yamandla ahlukahlukene (ama-heater amanzi, ama-motors kagesi, iziko lokungeniswa, abalandeli, njll.). Umgomo wokusebenza kwabo ususelwa ekuvuleni nasekuvalweni kwesekethe ngokususa noma ukufaka i-voltage kwikhoyili kagesi.

Isiqalo singahlonywa ngamadivayisi angeziwe njenge:
 1. edluliselwe Thermal for motor eziphuthumayo shaqa
 2. Iqembu lokuxhumana elisezingeni eliphansi elengeziwe (noma amaqembu), elisetshenziswa kuma-circuits wokulawula
 3. Qala futhi umise izinkinobho
 4. Idivayisi evaliwe yokuphuthumayo uma kwenzeka kwephuka esinye sezigaba zenethiwekhi yokuphakelwa kwamandla ka-motors kagesi anezigaba ezintathu.

Ngokujwayelekile iziqalisi zisebenza ngamashintshi amabili e-Push, iswishi ethi "qala" evamise ukucishwa (isb. Push-to-make) kanye neswishi "yokumisa" evamise ukwenziwa (isb. Push-to-break).
 	 Lapho i-motor ingasebenzi, yize i-line line voltage itholakala, awekho amanje adonswa yi-starter noma i-motor.
 	 Lapho inkinobho "yokuqala" icindezelwe, imoto ayinikwa amandla ngqo, kunalokho i-electromagnet ku-contactor ifakwa amandla. Iswishi kazibuthe ku-contactor bese iyasebenza, ngasikhathi sinye ishintshele kumoto futhi inikeze amandla okuzixhasa ukuze igcine isimo sayo. Ngakho-ke lapho inkinobho yokuqala ikhishwa, inkinobho kazibuthe ihlala isebenza futhi imoto ihlala isebenza.
 	 Ukucindezela inkinobho "yokumisa" kwephula isekethe liye kuxhuma okugcina linike amandla i-elektromagnet yalo ngaleyo ndlela lisike okokugcina kumoto.

Amandla kagesi ukusakazwa kwezinhlayiya ezikhokhisiwe, njengama-electron noma ama-ion, ahamba kumqhubi wegesi noma esikhaleni. Kukalwa njengezinga lenetha lokugeleza kwemali ekhokhwa ugesi edlula isifunda.\n \t Amandla kagesi ayadingeka ukukhanyisa izindlu nemigwaqo, ukuqinisekisa ukusebenza kwemishini yasendlini neyezezimboni, ukuhamba kwezinto zokuhamba ngogesi, njll.

\t Iyunithi le-SI lamandla kagesi yi-ampere, noma i-amp, okuwukuhamba kwenkokhiso kagesi ngaphesheya kobuso ngesilinganiso secoulomb ngomzuzwana. I-ampere (uphawu: A) iyunithi lesisekelo le-SI. Amandla kagesi alinganiswa kusetshenziswa ithuluzi elibizwa ngokuthi i-ammeter.

, lapho ngikhona njengamanje ngokusebenzisa umqhubi ngamayunithi ama-amperes, i-V umehluko ongaba khona olinganiswa ngaphesheya komqhubi ngamayunithi ama-volts, kanti u-R ukumelana nomqhubi kumayunithi ama-ohms.\n \t Ngokuqondile, umthetho ka-Ohm uthi i-R kulobu budlelwane ihlala njalo, izimele kunamanje.

Ukumelana kagesi kungubuningi bomzimba obuchaza impahla yomqhubi ukuvimbela ukudlula kwamandla kagesi futhi kulingana nenani lamandla emikhawulweni yomqhubi kuze kube manje eligeleza ngawo.\n Ukumelana kungabalwa ngefomula:

, kuphi
 "R" ukumelana, Ω.
 "U" umehluko ongaba khona ekugcineni komqhubi, V.
 "I" amandla wamanje, A.

, lapho u- \"I\" ekhona njengamanje ngokusebenzisa umqhubi ngamayunithi ama-amperes, i- \"U\" ingamandla alinganiselwa ngaphesheya komqhubi ngamayunithi wama-volts, kanti u- \"R\" ukumelana nomqhubi ngamayunithi ama-ohms.

, kuphi
 "F" kungumbutho weCoulomb
 "q1" kubiza umzimba wokuqala
 "q2" yinkokhiso yecala lesibili
 "r" kuyibanga phakathi kwamacala

, kuphi
 "Q" inani lokushisa elikhishwe ngumqhubi ngezamanje, J
 "I" okwamanje kumqhubi, A
 "R" ukumelana nogesi komqhubi, Ω
 "t" - isikhathi sokugeleza samanje, okwesibili

Umthetho ka-Ohm uthi i-current ngokusebenzisa umqhubi phakathi kwamaphoyinti amabili ilingana ngqo ne-voltage kuwo womabili amaphuzu. Kwethulwa ukulingana njalo, ukumelana, umuntu ufika esilinganisweni esijwayelekile sezibalo esichaza lobu budlelwane:
\t Okwamanje kulingana ngqo namandla kagesi futhi ngokulingana ngokulingana nokumelana nogesi.

isekethe kusekelwe ezimisweni ezishisayo noma zikagesi. Cishe wonke ama-breaker wesifunda wanamuhla azisebenzisa zombili lezi zimiso ngasikhathi sinye.
 	 Ukuvikelwa okushisayo kuvumela ukulandelela ukweqa kwesikhathi eside kwenani lamanje elivunyelwe kakhulu. Uma kwenzeka okweqile, ipuleti le-bimetallic (1) likhubazeka, okwenza kusebenze ukukhishwa, okuvula isekethe kagesi.
 	 Ukukhishwa kwamandla kagesi (2) kuphendula ekukhuleni okunamandla kwamanje, ngokwesibonelo, njengakwisigamu esifushane.
 	 Isikhathi nejubane lekhefu lichazwa ngesici sesikhathi samanje, kuphasiphothi yedivayisi.

Amandla kagesi isilinganiso, ngesikhathi ngasinye, lapho amandla kagesi edluliswa yisifunda sikagesi.\n \t Amandla kagesi avame ukukhiqizwa ngama-generator kagesi, kodwa futhi anganikezwa ngemithombo efana namabhethri kagesi. Imvamisa inikezwa amabhizinisi namakhaya yimboni yamandla kagesi ngegridi yamandla kagesi.\n \t amandla kagesi kungaba inikelwe olude by yokudlulisela imigqa futhi esetshenziselwa izicelo ezifana ezinyakazayo, ukukhanya noma ukushisa nge ukusebenza kahle eliphezulu.

- Isigaba sesithathu
 - Isigaba esisodwa
 - Voltage edluliselwe-isokhethi
 - Njengentambo yokwelulwa

\t Ukudluliswa kwamandla kagesi kwanamuhla kungaba nezilungiselelo eziningi. Cabanga ngomgomo oyisisekelo wokusebenza: ngokushesha nje lapho i-microcontroller ibhalisa ukuphambuka kwamandla kusuka kunani elibekiwe, kudluliswa i-electromagnetic relay, nayo evule isekethe kagesi. Uma i-voltage ibuyiselwa, ukunikezwa kwamandla kubathengi nakho kubuyiselwa.

Kwezinye izimo, ibha yesi-6 ingakhombisa ukuthembeka kwesiphikisi. Kulokhu, ibanzi ngokuphindwe ka-1.5 kunezona eziyinhloko. Ukuthembeka kuboniswa njengephesenti lokwehluleka kwento ngamahora wokusebenza ayi-1000.
 	 UBrown 1%
 	 0.1%
 	 uOlintshi 0.01%
 	 Okuphuzi 0,001%
\t Njengoba amanani amanje nawamandla kagesi ahlala njalo futhi elingana namanani asheshayo nganoma yisiphi isikhathi, amandla angabalwa kusetshenziswa ifomula:
Amandla Active \n P = U ∙ I ∙ cos φ , watt (W)
Amandla asebenzayo \n Q = U ∙ I ∙ sin φ , var
V = J / C , lapho u- \"V\" kungugesi, \"J\" kungumsebenzi noma amandla aseJoules, \"C\" akhokhiswa e-Coulombs
Amandla wevoltage noma kagesi akhonjiswa ngokufanekiswa yi-∆V, i-V eyenziwe lula, noma u-U, ngokwesimo kumthetho wesifunda ka-Ohm noma weKirchhoff.
\t Umqondo we voltage wethulwa nguGeorg Ohm ephepheni lika-1827, elaphakamisa imodeli ye-hydrodynamic yamandla kagesi ukuze ichaze umthetho ka-Ohm onamandla owatholakala ngo-1826: U = I ∙ R

Amandla kagesi ngumahluko wamandla kagesi phakathi kwamaphoyinti amabili, ochazwa njengomsebenzi odingekayo ngeyunithi ngayinye yokukhokha ukuhambisa inkokhiso yokuhlola phakathi kwamaphoyinti amabili. Ku-International System of Units, iyunithi ethathwe ye-voltage (umehluko ongaba khona) ibizwa nge-volt.\n \t Kumayunithi we-SI, umsebenzi ngeyunithi ngayinye ukhonjiswa njengama-joule nge-coulomb ngayinye, lapho i-volt 1 = i-joule eyodwa (yomsebenzi) nge-coulomb eyodwa (ekhokhiswayo).

\t Abaqhubi abaphakathi komthombo wamandla kagesi nomthwalo babizwa ngemigqa, futhi amandla aphakathi kwemigqa emibili abizwa ngokuthi yi-line voltage. Amandla kagesi alinganiswa phakathi kwanoma yimuphi umugqa nokungathathi hlangothi abizwa ngokuthi yi-phase voltage. Isibonelo, ngensizakalo ye-volt engu-208/120, i-voltage line yi-208 Volts, kanti i-voltage yesigaba yi-120 Volts.\n \t U (ulayini voltage) = √3 × U (phase voltage) = 1.73 × U (phase voltage)
\t Uxhumano oluboshiwe likuvumela ukuthi ubambe ngokuphepha izintambo ndawonye. Ibuye ikuvumele ukuthi uxhume izintambo zethusi ne-aluminium, into esemqoka ukubeka ama-washer phakathi kwabaqhubi.

\t Isiteshi sikagesi siyingxenye yohlelo lokukhiqiza, lokuhambisa nokusabalalisa kagesi. Izinto eziguqula amandla asuka phezulu ziye phansi, noma emuva, noma zenze eminye yemisebenzi ethile ebalulekile. Phakathi kwesiteshi esikhiqizayo nomthengi, amandla kagesi angahamba ngeziteshi ezimbalwa ngamazinga kagesi ahlukene. Isiteshi singabandakanya ama-transformer ukushintsha amazinga kagesi phakathi kwamanani aphezulu wokudlulisa kanye namanani aphansi okusabalalisa, noma ekuxhumaneni kwezingcingo ezimbili zokudlulisa ezihlukile.

\t Isiteshi esinama-step-up transformers sonyusa amandla kagesi futhi i-current incishisiwe ngokufanele, ngenkathi isiteshi sesitebhisi sokuya phansi sinciphisa amandla okukhipha futhi okwamanje kukhuphuka ngokulingana.\n Kungani ukwandisa i-voltage? \n \t Isidingo sokwengeza amandla kagesi ahambisanayo avela ukonga kakhulu insimbi esetshenziswa ezintanjeni zokudlulisa amandla, nokunciphisa ukulahleka kokumelana okusebenzayo. Indawo edingekayo yokuhlukaniswa kwezintambo inqunywa ngamandla wamanje odlulayo nokungabikho kokukhishwa kwe-corona. Ukwehla kwamandla esikhathi esidlulayo kufaka ukwehla kokulahleka kwamandla, okuthembele ngqo kumandla wamanje we-quadratic.

 ● Isiteshi esincane
 ● Iziteshi zokuguqula izinto
 ● Ukushintsha isiteshi

 ● Isiteshi esincane

\t Khumbula ukungathembeli kuphela ekubhaleni imibala ngesigaba, uziro, noma umhlabathi. Kungenzeka ukuthi uchwepheshe akakwazanga ukuhambisana nalesi simiso lapho enza umsebenzi. Themba kodwa uqinisekise.

\t Umthetho wesibili kaKirchhoff uthi isamba sawo wonke ama-voltages azungeze noma iyiphi iluphu evaliwe kusekethe kufanele alingane zero. Lokhu kungumphumela wokongiwa kwemali ekhokhwayo kanye nokongiwa kwamandla.

\t Lo mthetho uthi, kunoma iyiphi i-node (junction) kusekethe kagesi, isamba semisinga egeleza kuleyo node silingana nesamba semisinga egeleza iphume kuleyo node.\n \t Ngokulinganayo: Isamba se-algebraic semisinga kwinethiwekhi yabaqhubi abahlangana ngasendaweni ayiziro.

Umugqa we-LED ungumthombo okhanyayo osuselwa kuma-LED. Kuyimodyuli ye-LED ebhodini lesifunda eliguquguqukayo elinama-equidistant e-LED avela komunye nomunye. Ngesikhathi sokukhiqizwa, itheyiphu ifakwa kumaroll 1 ukuya ku-30 m ubude. Ukuze ubeke umkhawulo wamanje ngama-LED, amakhemikhali afakwa kusifunda sikagesi, nawo abekwe kuthebhu.

\t Amalwibhoni kungaba ezinombala ofanayo (osasitini, green, blue, ophuzi, white) noma multi-ezinemibala, kanye nekhono ukudala cishe kunoma iyiphi umthunzi. Ukukhanya okumhlophe nakho kuza ngemibala ehlukahlukene, kungabanda noma kufudumale (kusuka ku-2700 K kuye ku-10000 K.).

\t -LED usebenza ku-current current ngakho-ke kufanele uxhunywe ku-voltage engaguquki, imvamisa i-12 V, ingaphansi kangako i-24 V no-5 V.\n \t Ngakho-ke, ngokwesibonelo, ngetheyiphu 240 SMD 3014, enobude obuphelele bamamitha ayi-4, iyunithi yokuphakela ugesi enamandla angama-24 W (amandla alinganisiwe eteyipu) * 4 m * 1.15 (factor factor) = 110.4 Kuzodingeka.\n \t Ukulawula ukukhanya okushelelayo nombala wokukhanya womugqa we-LED onemibala, kusetshenziswa izilawuli, umgomo wawo ukushintsha ukukhanya kwama-LED ngokwehlukana ngombala ngamunye.

- Izinzuzo 
 ● Ukufakwa kalula.
 ● Izindleko zokusebenza eziphansi. Ngokuya ngokukhanya okukhanyayo / izindleko zokusebenza, ama-LED anesinye sezilinganiso eziphakeme kakhulu.
 ● Ukuthembeka. Uma kuqhathaniswa namalambu endabuko we-incandescent kanye ne-fluorescent, ama-LED anempilo ende.
 ● Amandla angenamkhawulo wokukhuphula ukukhanya okukhanyayo uma kuqhathaniswa nemithombo yamaphoyinti
 ● Amandla wokusebenzisa izixazululo zokuqala zokwakha
 ● Amandla wokukhetha ithoni yombala oyifunayo yendawo lapho usebenzisa imichilo ye-RGB -LED nabalawuli
 ● Akunasidingo sezinto ezengeziwe zokufaka umswakama lapho usebenzisa imichilo ye-LED engenawo amanzi namandla kagesi
 ● Ukuphepha kagesi ngenxa yamandla ombane aphansi wamateyipu ngokwawo (kuncike ekusetshenzisweni kwamandla kagesi anama-transformer negebe le-galvanic phakathi kwamasekethe okuhambisa ugesi we-tepi kanye nebhlokhi yokuhambisa ugesi uqobo). 

 - Okubi 
 ● Imichilo ye-RGB ye-LED inekhono eliphansi lokunikeza umbala. Ukuze uthuthukise ukunikezwa kombala, umnikazi wegumbi kuzofanele afake izinto eziningi zokukhanyisa.
 ● Isakhiwo seteyipu asikwazi ukuxhunywa ezakhiweni ezindala. Lokhu kukhawulela kakhulu ububanzi bokusetshenziswa kwayo.
Isilinganiselo sobubanzi bekhebuli endaweni enqamulelayo futhi okuphambene nalokho

zikagesi zihlukaniswe ngezigaba ezimbili eziyinhloko:
 ● Ama-AC motors
 ● DC izinjini
 	 AC motors ahlukaniswe ngokomthetho wokusebenza:
 - asynchronous
 - evumelanisiwe
 	 oyisisekelo ngukuthi emishinini yokuvumelanisa i-harmonic yokuqala yamandla kazibuthe we-stator ihamba ngejubane le-Rotor (ngakho-ke i-Rotor uqobo ijikeleza ngejubane lensimu kazibuthe ku-stator), futhi kumishini ye-asynchronous kukhona njalo umehluko phakathi kwejubane lokuzungezisa i-Rotor nokujikeleza kwamandla kazibuthe ku-stator (inkambu ijikeleza ngokushesha kune-Rotor).
\t Kunenombolo enkulu kanye namathuluzi ahlukahlukene, ngokubukeka nangenhloso. Ake sibheke ezivame kakhulu.

● Ungazisebenzisi izintambo ezinezihlukanisi eziphelelwe yisikhathi.
 ● Ngaphambi kokwenza umsebenzi wokulungisa njengokubhola, ukusika, ukusika, qiniseka ukuthi akukho zingcingo ezibekiwe lapho.
 ● Faka izintambo ezingadingekile ngesikhathi sokusebenza, ukuze zingadali isekhethi elifushane.
 ● Buyisela amasokhethi namaswishi angasasebenzi, ikakhulukazi uma enhlansi ngesikhathi somsebenzi.
 ● Gwema ukusebenza ezintanjeni uma zinikwe amandla.
 ● Khetha usayizi ofanele wocingo wokufaka amandla izinto zikagesi.
Umdwebo wiring wokuguqula ukuqala kokuqala kukazibuthe
Umdwebo wiring wesiqalisi esingaguquguquki sikazibuthe esinezixhumanisi zemishini
Umdwebo okhombisayo wokuvula isibani sokukhanya ngesiqalo sikazibuthe

\t Lapho amandla kagesi edlula kumqhubi, ama-electron ashayisana nama-athomu ombambisi. Ngenxa yalokhu kushayisana kwamandla kagesi aguquka abe amandla okushisa bese kushisa umqhubi. Inikezwe amandla okushisa angatholakala ngomthetho kaJoule – Lenz.\n \t Ngo-1831-1842. UJoule J. futhi, ngokuzimela yena, uLenz EH uzame ukusungula ukuthi inani lokushisa elikhishiwe linqunywa njenge:

\t Umthetho waqala ukutholwa ngonyaka we-1785 ngusosayensi waseFrance uCharles-Augustin de Coulomb.\n \t Ubukhulu bamandla kagesi F phakathi kwamanani amaphoyinti amabili u-q1 no-q2 alingana ngqo nomkhiqizo wobukhulu bamanani futhi ngokulingana ngokulingana nesikwele sebanga eliphakathi kwabo. Njengamacala abuyisanayo, namacala aphikisanayo aheha.
Umthetho wesandla sokudla wokungeniswa kwamandla kazibuthe

\t ubamba umqhubi ngesandla sakho sokudla ukuze isithupha sakho esivelile sikhombe ukuqondiswa kwamanje, iminwe esele izokhombisa ukuqondiswa kwemigqa yokungenisa kazibuthe yensimu eyenziwe yilawa manje, evala umqhubi, ngakho-ke ukuqondiswa kwevektha yokungenisa kazibuthe ebhekiswe yonke indawo ngokungafani kule migqa.
Umthetho wesandla sokudla wamanje kumqhubi ohamba ngamandla kazibuthe

\t Uma intende yesandla sokudla ibekwe kahle ukuze imigqa yamandla kazibuthe ingene kuyo, futhi isithupha esigobile siqondiswe ekuhambeni komqhubi, iminwe emine eyeluliwe izokhombisa ukuqondiswa kwamandla wamanje wokungeniswa.

\t Uma lokushaja ezihambayo kanye uzibuthe uyaphumula, ke ngesandla sokunxele mthetho usebenza ukunquma isiqondiso amandla: \"Uma isandla sobunxele kahle ukuze imigqa yamandla kazibuthe omhlaba faka ecaleni engaphakathi perpendicular entendeni ukuze yona, neminwe emine yayiqondiswe ngasikhathi sinye (ngokuhamba kwenhlayiya ekhokhiswe kahle noma ngokumelene nokunyakaza kwalowo okhokhiswe kabi), bese isithupha esabanjiswa emuva ngo-90 ° sikhombisa ukuqondiswa kwebutho elibambile likaLorentz noma i-Ampere. \"

\t Uma ubeka intende yesandla sakho sobunxele ukuze imigqa yokungeniswa kukazibuthe ingene ohlangothini lwangaphakathi lwesundu ngokuqondana nayo, futhi iminwe emine iqondiswe ngasikhathi samanje, lapho isithupha esibanjwe emuva ngo-90 ° sikhombisa ukuqondiswa kwamandla isebenza ohlangothini lwensimu kazibuthe iye kumqhubi wamanje. Lo mbutho ubizwa ngokuthi yi-Ampere force.

Isikhathi - isimo samanje sinquma ijubane lomsebenzi wesifunda ojikelezayo ngokuya ngokugeleza kwamanje.\n \t Ijika elingenhla kwigrafu libonisa isimo esibandayo sedivayisi, okungukuthi ngaphandle kokudlula kwamanje kwaso, ijika eliphansi libonisa isimo esishisayo sedivayisi.\n \t Okulandelayo yizibonelo zamagrafu wezici zesikhathi samanje zohlobo B no-C ukuthola amagrafu ngqo bona ipasipoti yedivayisi ethile.

\t Iphuzu lokunqanyulwa kwemibandela okwephula isekethe (1,13 · In) lihlala likhonjiswa eshadini. Ngalesi sikhathi samanje, ikhefu lesifunda ngeke licishe kungakapheli ihora elingu-1. Isibonelo, kwikhefu lesifunda elinamanje elilinganisiwe le-16 A, lapho i-current of 1.13 In = 18.08 (A) igeleza ngayo, ukukhishwa kwayo okushisayo ngeke kusebenze kungakapheli ihora elilodwa.\n \t Kukhona nomqondo \"okhubazekile ojwayelekile wamanje\" webhuleki lesifunda futhi ulingana no-1.45 · Ku. Ngalesi sikhathi samanje, ikhefu lesifunda lizocisha kungadluli ihora elilodwa. Ngakho-ke, ikhefu lesifunda elinamandla amanje ka-16A lizogcina umthwalo ongu-23.2 A kungabi ngaphezu kwehora elilodwa.\n \t Kusuka kokungenhla singaphetha ngokuthi ukukhethwa kwesihlukanisi sesekhethi kanye nokukhethwa kwengxenye yesiphambano sekhebula kufanele kuthathwe ngendlela efanelekile ngangokunokwenzeka.

Igilobhu lesibani se-incandescent ngumthombo wokukhanya kagesi onentambo yocingo evuthayo ize ikhanye. Ukuze uvikele intambo ku-oxidation ifakwe ngaphakathi kwesibani. Okwamanje kunikezwa intambo ngamatheminali noma izintambo ezifakwe engilazini. Isokhethi le-bulb linikeza ukusekelwa kwemishini nokuxhuma kukagesi.

\t incandescent bulbs akhiqizwa ngobukhulu obuhlukahlukene, ukukhishwa kokukhanya, nezilinganiso zamandla, kusuka ku-1.5 volts kuye ku-300 volts. Azidingi mishini yokulawula yangaphandle, zinezindleko eziphansi zokukhiqiza, futhi zisebenza ngokulinganayo ngokushintshana kwamanje noma okuqondile manje. Ngenxa yalokhu, isibani se-incandescent sisetshenziswe kabanzi ekukhanyeni kwasendlini nakwezentengiselwano, ekukhanyiseni okuphathekayo okufana namalambu etafula, amalambu emoto, namathoshi, nokukhanyisa okuhlobisa nokukhangisa.

1 - Isibani seglasi
 2 - Igesi engena
 3 - intambo ye-Tungsten
 4, 5 - Ucingo lokuxhumana
 6 - Izintambo zokusekela
 7 - I-Glass mount / ukwesekwa
 8 - Base contact wire, fuse
 9 - Intambo yesikulufa
 10 - Izinto zokuvala umoya
 11 - Oxhumana ngezinyawo zikagesi

\t Umgomo wokusebenza kwesibani se-incandescent kusekelwe esimweni sokushisa i-conductor lapho amandla kagesi edlula kuyo. Intambo ye-tungsten lapho ixhunywe emthonjeni wamandla ishiswa ekushiseni okuphezulu, futhi ikhipha ukukhanya. Ukukhanya okukhanyayo okukhishwe yi-filament kusondele emini yemvelo, ngakho-ke akubangeli ukungakhululeki ngesikhathi sokusetshenziswa isikhathi eside.\n \t Ububi obukhulu bamalambu we-incandescent ukusebenza kwawo okuphansi. Ingxenye eyodwa kuphela kweyishumi yamandla kagesi asetshenziswa yisibani aguqulwa abe ukukhanya okukhanyayo okubonakalayo. Iningi lala mandla liguqulwa libe amandla ashisayo.
Isekethe yokuxhuma imitha yesigaba sesithathu ngama-transformer amanje

\t Ngemuva kokuxhuma isiguquli kumthombo wamanje oshintshashintshayo, kwakheka ukuguquguquka kukazibuthe oshintshanayo kumazombezombe awo ayinhloko. Idluliselwa ngesekethe kazibuthe iye emazombezaneni wesibili, iheha i-EMF eguquguqukayo (amandla kagesi) kuzo. Uma kunesidingo sokusetshenziswa kumjikelezo wesibili wokugubha, kwenzeka amandla kagesi.\n \t Ngokukhetha isilinganiso esidingekayo phakathi kwenani lamaphuzu ama-windings aphansi nasesekondari, ungakhuphula noma wehlise amandla wevolumu ekushayweni kwesibili. Uma kunesidingo sokuthola i-voltage emazombezombe wesibili amakhulu kunalawo ahlinzekelwe okuyinhloko, khona-ke inani lamathuba okugoqa kwesibili kufanele libe likhulu kunelokuqala.

\t Uma ikhebuli linokufakwa kabili kwe-PVC, lingabekwa ngaphakathi kukakhonkolo noma ezindaweni ezinodonga, ngaphandle kokusebenzisa ukuvikelwa okwengeziwe. Izintambo ezifihliwe akumele zibekwe ngokulandelana, kuvunyelwe kuphela imigqa eqondile neqondile. Qiniseka ukuthi wenza umdwebo wiring ukuze ugweme ukulimala kwekhebula ngokuzayo lapho kubhola noma kushaywa izipikili.
\t Ngokuvikela ikhebula okungeziwe, izintambo ezifihliwe zingahanjiswa emapayipini lukathayela.

\t Ikhebula libekwa phansi phansi ngo-corrugation futhi lilungiswe ngabakaki noma izibopho bese lithelwa nge-screed kakhonkolo. Ukushuba kokhonkolo noma isamente-isihlabathi screed ngaphezulu kukonakala kufanele kube ngu-3 kuye ku-5 cm.

\t Ikhebula elinokufakwa kabili livunyelwe ukuthi limiswe ebusweni bezindonga ezenziwe ngezinto ezingashisi ngaphandle kokuvikelwa okwengeziwe.\n \t Ezindongeni ezenziwe ngezinto ezivuthayo, ungabeka ikhebuli ku-PVC corrugation, plinths, PVC cable cable, hoses hoses and metal pipe noma kuma-insulators.

\t tUkufakwa kwentambo yangaphakathi ebhodini lokushintsha kwenziwa kusetshenziswa ucingo oluguquguqukayo olunengxenye yesiphambano engu-2.5 kuya ku-6 sq mm. Imikhawulo yocingo oluguquguqukayo kufanele ikhutshwe ngama-ferrules akhethekile. Ama-ferruls angaba ngocingo olulodwa noma amabili. Cindezela imihlathi kufanele isetshenziselwe ukuqumba ama-ferrules. Ukuxhunywa kukagesi kwama-breakers wesifunda atholakala emugqeni ofanayo kwenziwa kalula kusetshenziswa ama-bus bus.
1 - Ibhasi lebhasi; 2 - Ucingo oluminyene olune-ferrule ephindwe kabili; 3 - Cindezela izigaxa

\t Uma ucindezela inkinobho, ilambu liyakhanya, uma ucindezela noma iyiphi yezinkinobho futhi, iyacisha. Umgomo uyefana nowesifunda esinamaswishi okudlula, kuphela kulokhu izindleko zekhebula ziyancishiswa nokufakwa kube lula.

\t elekthronikhi nakunjiniyela kagesi, i-fuse iyinsimbi yokuphepha kagesi esebenza ukuhlinzeka ngokuvikelwa okweqile kwesekethe kagesi. Ingxenye yayo ebalulekile yintambo yensimbi noma umucu oncibilikayo lapho ukugeleza okuningi kakhulu kuwo, ngaleyo ndlela kumise noma kuphazamise okukhona. Kuyithuluzi lokunikela; uma i-fuse isisebenzisile isekhethi evulekile, kufanele ishintshwe noma ifakwe kabusha, kuye ngohlobo.

\t I-fuse yingxenye ebuthakathaka yesekethe kagesi evikelekile esebenza kwimodi yezimo eziphuthumayo, ngaleyo ndlela iphule isekethe futhi ivimbele ukubhujiswa okulandelayo kwezinto ezibaluleke kakhulu zesekethe kagesi ngamazinga okushisa aphezulu abangelwa amandla amaningi ngokweqile.

1- Blade fuse
 2- Fuse yamadivayisi anamandla aphansi 

 	 Izinto eziyinhloko ze-fuse yilezi: i-fuse (i-fusible element), icala lapho kufakwa khona i-fuse futhi engashintshwa uma kwenzeka ukutubeka (kwamafuse aphansi njengamanje, i-fuse ayinakushintshwa, ukwakhiwa olahlayo futhi lapho icindezelwa, yonke intambo yomnikazi iyashintshwa).
 	 Isixhumanisi fusible ngaphakathi igobolondo ibekwe endaweni arcing naphakathi ekhethekile (isibonelo, asebenza ngebhethri isihlabathi), okuyinto, lapho fuse-isixhumanisi liphele, uye wakwenza ayaphola bese deionizes le arc kagesi, ukuvimbela plasma ukuba baphume ngokusebenzisa izindlu. Kwezinye izinhlobo zamafiyuzi, umzimba wenziwe ngento ekhiqiza igesi (ngokwesibonelo, i-fiber), ngaphansi komphumela oshisayo we-arc, ukuvela okukhulu kwegesi kuyenzeka, amagesi abangelwa afaka isandla ekucimeni i-arc ngaphakathi komzimba.

\t Umsiki wesifunda ozenzakalelayo wenzelwe ukuvikela amanethiwekhi kagesi ekulayisheni ngokweqile nakuma-circuits amafushane. Kufike esikhundleni se-fuse evamile. Iyaphinda isebenze futhi ayidingi ukushintshwa uma sekucutshunguliwe.
\t Abazingeli fuse abazenzekelayo nabajwayelekile manje sebayinto yakudala. Kunconywa ukuthi uwabuyisele ngama-breakers wesifunda.

Ukulingana okungaba khona kusetshenziselwa ukudala ukuxhumana kagesi phakathi kwezinto ezihambisanayo, ukuze kuzuzwe ukulingana okungaba khona. Ngaphezu kwalokho, ukuxhumeka kokuziphatha kuqinisekisa ukulingana kokukhokhiswa kwemali phakathi kwezindikimba ezimbili noma izingxenye. Bonke abaqhubi abavikelayo kanye nabaqhubi be-equipotential bonding bahlangana ndawonye kubha enkulu yomhlaba (i-PE bar) futhi baxhumeke ezisekelweni zomhlaba (ukuqiniswa kwensimbi kuma-slabs kakhonkolo) nge-conductor yomhlaba.
 	 Lokhu kulingana okungaba namandla okufeza imisebenzi emibili ehlukile ekufakweni kukagesi komshini:
 	 1. Ukuvikela
 	 Ukuvikelwa komuntu ekushayweni ugesi uma kwenzeka kuba nephutha emshinini noma ohlelweni, ngokusebenzisa uhlelo lokuvikela lokuqhuba.
 	 2. Ukulingana okusemandleni okusebenza
 	 Ukuvimbela ukungasebenzi kahle (njengomphumela wamaphutha esihlangu) nokwenza ngcono ukuhambisana kwe-electromagnetic (EMC) kwezinto ezibucayi zikagesi.

string.b: Awukwazi ukusebenzisa i-PES kusistimu ye-TN-C.\n Inethiwekhi kumele ibe nabaqhubi abahlukile abavikelayo (i-PE) kanye nabangathathi hlangothi (N).

resources.string: \t tIdivayisi yamanje eyinsalela ayinakho ukuvikeleka kwayo kuma-short-circuit nokulayishwa ngokweqile, ngakho-ke, kuyadingeka ukufaka i-breaker yesifunda ochungechungeni nayo.
Ithebula lesilinganiso sedivayisi yamanje ye-Residual ne-breaker breaker kulinganiswe imisinga.
\t RCBO ayidingi ukuvikeleka okungeziwe ngokwephula isekethe.
ICosine always ihlala ingaphansi noma ilingana no-1
Amandla kagesi aguqula ukuqondisa kwawo izikhathi eziningi ngomzuzwana ngezikhathi ezijwayelekile.
Ithuluzi lokulinganisa ukuhamba kwamandla kagesi kuma-amperes. Ama-Ammeters ahlala exhunywe ngochungechunge nesifunda esizohlolwa.
Inani eliphakeme lamanje kagesi umqhubi noma idivaysi engayiphatha ngaphambi kokugcina ukuwohloka okusheshayo noma okuqhubekayo.

Iyunithi yokukala yomthamo webhethri. Kutholakala ngokuphindaphinda okwamanje (kuma-amperes) ngesikhathi (ngamahora) lapho okugeleza khona manje. Isibonelo, ibhethri elihlinzeka ngama-amperes ama-5 amahora angama-20 kuthiwa liletha amahora ayi-100 ampere.
Iyunithi yokukala yokuqina kwamandla kagesi ageleza kusifunda. I-ampere eyodwa ilingana nokugeleza kwamanje kwekhowe elilodwa ngomzuzwana.
Kukalwe kuma-volt-ampers (VA). Amandla abonakalayo angumkhiqizo wamandla we-rms nama-rms wamanje.

Ingxenye ehambayo ye-generator noma yemoto. Yakhiwa ngamakhondaktha ajikeleza ngamandla kazibuthe ukuze anikeze amandla noma amandla ngokufakwa ngogesi. Amaphuzu aphakanyisiwe kuzilawuli ze-generator nawo abizwa ngokuthi ama-armature.

Ikhono lomzimba lokugcina imali ekhokhelwa ugesi. Kukalwe kuma-farads njengokulinganisa kwemali ekhokhiswa ugesi yento (i-Q, kulinganiswa ngama-coulombs) kuya kumandla kagesi entweni (V, kulinganiswa ngama-volts).
Idivayisi esetshenziselwa ukugcina ishaji kagesi, equkethe ipheya elilodwa noma ngaphezulu abaqhubi abahlukaniswe yisivikelo. Imvamisa isetshenziselwa ukuhlunga ama-voltage spikes.
Indlela evaliwe lapho ama-electron avela ku-voltage noma ukugeleza komthombo wamanje. Amasekethe angaba ngochungechunge, ngokufana, noma kunoma yikuphi ukuhlanganiswa kwalokhu okubili.

Idivayisi ezenzakalelayo yokumisa ukugeleza kwamanje kwisekethe kagesi. Ukubuyisela insizakalo, ikhefu lesekethe kufanele lisethwe kabusha (livaliwe) ngemuva kokulungisa imbangela yokugcwala ngokweqile noma ukwehluleka. Ama-breaker wesekethe asetshenziswa ngokuhlangana nokudlulisa okuvikelayo ukuvikela amasekethe emaphutheni.
Noma iyiphi into lapho amandla kagesi angageleza ngokukhululeka. Izinto eziqhubayo, njengezinsimbi, zinokumelana okuphansi. Intambo yethusi ne-aluminium yizona ezihamba phambili ezihamba phambili.

Ukukhishwa kwe-corona ukukhishwa kagesi okulethwa yi-ionization yomswakama onjengomoya ozungeze umqhubi oshaja ngogesi. Ukukhishwa kwe-corona okuzenzakalelayo kwenzeka ngokwemvelo ezinhlelweni ezinamandla amakhulu ngaphandle kokuthi kunakekelwa ukunqanda amandla enkambu kagesi.
Ukuhamba kwenkokhiso kagesi ngomqhubi. Amandla kagesi angaqhathaniswa nokugeleza kwamanzi epayipini. Kukalwe ngama-amperes.
Ushintsho kugagasi olushintshayo lukagesi olusuka ku-zero luye esiqongweni esihle luye ku-zero laya esiqongweni esingesihle futhi lubuyela ku-zero.
Inani eliphakathi lamandla noma inani elihlobene ngesikhathi esithile.
Inani elilinganisa amandla ento ukugcina amandla kagesi enkambu kagesi.
Inkambu ephezulu kagesi ukuthi into emsulwa ingamelana nayo ngaphansi kwezimo ezinhle ngaphandle kokuphuka.
Idivayisi ye-semiconductor enamatheminali amabili, evumela ukugeleza kwamanje ohlangothini olulodwa kuphela. Ama-diode avumela ukugeleza kwamanje lapho i-anode ilungile maqondana ne-cathode.
Amandla kagesi agelezela ohlangothini olulodwa kuphela.
Noma iyiphi into, okuyisixazululo, ehlukaniswe ne-ions futhi yenziwa ikwazi ukuqhuba amandla kagesi. Isixazululo se-sulfuric acid - samanzi ebhetri yokugcina i-electrolyte.
Umehluko ongaba khona ovame ukuveza amandla kagesi. Kukalwe ngama-volts.
Inhlayiya encane ezungeza i-nucleus ye-athomu. Inecala elibi kugesi.

Umbono ochaza uhlobo lukagesi kanye nokushintshaniswa kwama-elektroni \"amahhala\" phakathi kwama-athomu womqhubi. Iphinde isetshenziswe njengethiyori eyodwa ukuchaza ukuqondiswa kokugeleza kwamanje kusifunda.
Iyunithi yokukala ye-capacitance. I-farad eyodwa ilingana ne-coulomb eyodwa nge-volt ngayinye.

Uhlobo lwe-on lokuphindaphindeka kumasekethe kagesi olwenzeka lapho isifunda esine-inductance engahambisani nomugqa sondliwa kusuka kumthombo one-capacitance yochungechunge, futhi isifunda sibhekene nokuphazamiseka njengokuvulwa kweswishi. Kungadala ama-overvoltages kanye nama-overcurrents ohlelweni lwamandla kagesi futhi kungabeka ingozi ekudluliseni nasekusetshenzisweni kwemishini nakubasebenzi abasebenzayo
Inani lemijikelezo ngomzuzwana. Kukalwe eHertz. Uma umsinga uqeda umjikelezo owodwa ngomzuzwana, imvamisa iyi-1 Hz; Imijikelezo engama-60 ngomzuzwana ilingana nama-60 Hz.

Idivayisi ephazamisa isifunda ehlanganisa isiqeshana sensimbi esincibilikayo futhi sephule isekethe kagesi uma i-current idlula ileveli ephephile. Ukubuyisela insizakalo, i-fuse kufanele ishintshwe kusetshenziswe i-fuse efanayo ngosayizi ofanayo nokukala ngemuva kokulungisa imbangela yokwehluleka.
Idivayisi eguqula amandla womshini abe amandla kagesi.
Indawo yokukhomba kusifunda sikagesi lapho kukalwa khona imithamo, indlela ejwayelekile yokubuyisa amandla kagesi, noma ukuxhumana okuqondile eMhlabeni.

Idivayisi ehloselwe ukuvikela izisebenzi ezisebenza ukuvuselela amandla wesekethe noma ingxenye yazo esikhathini esinqunyiwe lapho i-current to ground idlula inani elithile elinqunywe kusengaphambili elingaphansi kwaleyo edingekayo ukuze kusetshenziswe idivayisi evikelayo eyeqile yesifunda sokuphakela .

Iyunithi yokukala ye-inductance. Uma isilinganiso sokushintshwa kwamanje kusekethe kuyi-ampere eyodwa ngomzuzwana futhi amandla we-electromotive avelayo ayi-volt eyodwa, khona-ke ukwehliswa kwesekethe kungu-henry owodwa.
Iyunithi yokukala yemvamisa. Ukushintsha isikhathi sangaphambili somjikelezo ngomzuzwana (cps).

Isilinganiso sokuphikiswa okulethwa yisifunda kumanje lapho kusetshenziswa i-voltage. Impedance yandisa umqondo wokumelana namasekethi we-AC, futhi inakho kokubili ubukhulu nesigaba, ngokungafani nokumelana, okunobukhulu kuphela.

Impahla yomqhubi lapho ushintsho lwamanje olugeleza ngayo ludala (lwakha) i-voltage (amandla we-electromotive) kubo bobabili umqhubi uqobo (ukuzimela ngokwabo) nakunoma yibaphi abaqhubi abaseduze (inductance mutual). Kukalwa ku-henry (H).
Ikhoyili yocingo esongwe ngensimbi. I-inductance ilingana ngqo nenani lokujika kwekhoyili.

Noma iyiphi impahla lapho amandla kagesi angahambi ngokukhululeka. Izinto zokuvikela, ezifana nengilazi, injoloba, umoya, namapulasitiki amaningi anokumelana okuphezulu kakhulu. Ama-insulators avikela imishini nempilo ekushayweni ugesi.
Isisetshenziswa esiguqula i-current eqonde kumanje eshintshanayo.

Umkhiqizo wamandla ku-kW nesikhathi emahoreni. Ilingana namahora angu-1000 we-Watt. Isibonelo, uma isibani se-watt esingu-100 sisetshenziselwa amahora ama-4, amandla angu-0.4kWhs azosetshenziswa (100W x 1kW / 1000 Watts x 4 amahora). Amandla kagesi athengiswa ngamayunithi we-kWh.
Idivayisi esetshenziswa ukukala ukusetshenziswa kwamandla kagesi.
Noma yini esebenzisa amandla kagesi, njengezibani, ama-transformers, ama-heater nama-motors kagesi.

Isimo lapho kukhona ukulahleka okungalindelekile komthwalo ohlelweni okwenza ukuthi imishini ekhiqizayo ibe ngokweqile. Isivivinyo sokwenqatshwa komthwalo siqinisekisa ukuthi uhlelo lungamelana nokulahleka okungalindelekile komthwalo lubuyele ezimeni ezijwayelekile zokusebenza kusetshenziswa umbusi walo. Amabhange wokulayisha ajwayele ukusetshenziselwa lezi zivivinyo njengengxenye yenqubo yokuthumela amasistimu kagesi kagesi.
Kwenzeka lapho kushintshwa okukhona kwekhoyili eyodwa kukhiqiza amandla ombane kwikhoyili yesibili.
Iyunithi yokukala ukumelana. I-ohm eyodwa ilingana nokumelana kwisekethe kudlulisa i-ampere eyodwa lapho kufakwa umehluko ongaba khona we-volt eyodwa.
Isibalo sezibalo esichaza ubudlelwano phakathi kwamanje, amandla kagesi, nokumelana (V = IR).
Ithuluzi lokulinganisa ukumelana nama-ohms wesekethe kagesi.

Isifunda esivulekile noma esivulekile senzeka lapho isifunda siphukile, njengocingo olwephukile noma inkinobho evulekile, okuphazamisa ukuhamba kwamanje ngesekethe. Kufana ne-valve evaliwe ohlelweni lwamanzi.

Isifunda lapho kunezindlela eziningi zokuhamba kukagesi. Umthwalo ngamunye oxhunywe endleleni ehlukile uthola amandla wesifunda agcwele, futhi ingqikithi yesekethe yamanje ilingana nesamba semisinga yegatsha ngalinye.
Ukwehlukaniswa ngogesi entweni ethile (ikakhulukazi amakristalu athile) avela ekusetshenzisweni kwengcindezi yemishini (ingcindezi).
Igama elihlanganyelwe elisetshenziswe ekugcineni okuhle (+) nokubi (-) kukazibuthe noma imishini kagesi efana nekhoyili noma ibhethri.
Izinga amandla kagesi adluliswa ngalo yisifunda sikagesi. Kukalwe ku-Watts.

Isilinganiso samandla kagesi uqobo sichithwa yisifunda se-AC kumkhiqizo wamanani we-rms wamanje nawamandla kagesi. Umehluko phakathi kwalezi zinto ezimbili ubangelwa ukusabela kwisekethe futhi umele amandla angawenzi msebenzi owusizo.
Idivayisi yokudlulisela edizayinelwe ukukhubeka okwephula isifunda lapho kutholwa iphutha.
Ingxenye kagesi esungula futhi igcine amandla kagesi namandla kazibuthe wemishini ye-AC. Kukhona kusifunda se-AC lapho amandla wamanje namandla kagesi engekho esigabeni. Kukalwe nge-VARS.
Idivayisi kagesi eguqula amandla ashintshanayo abe aqonde ngqo ngokuvumela umsinga ukugeleza ngawo uye ohlangothini olulodwa kuphela.
Isishintshi sekhoyili kagesi esisebenzisa umsinga omncane ukulawula umsinga omkhulu kakhulu.
Ukumelana okunikezwa isekethe kazibuthe kumugqa wamandla kumandla kazibuthe.
Ukuphikisana nokudlula kwamandla kagesi. Ukumelana nogesi kungaqhathaniswa nokungqubuzana okutholwa ngamanzi lapho kugeleza ngepayipi. Kukalwe ngama-ohms.
Idivayisi evame ukwenziwa ngocingo noma ngekhabhoni eveza ukumelana nokugeleza kwamanje.
Ingxenye ejikelezayo yomshini kagesi njenge-generator, motor, noma i-alternator.
I-Voltage eyenzeka kwikhoyili lapho kunoshintsho lwamanje.

Into eqinile enokusebenza phakathi kokuvinjelwa naleyo yezinsimbi eziningi, kungaba ngenxa yokwengezwa kokungcola noma ngenxa yemiphumela yokushisa. Amadivayisi enziwe ngama-semiconductors, ikakhulukazi i-silicon, ayizinto ezibalulekile kumasekethe amaningi kagesi.
Isifunda lapho ezinye izingxenye zesifunda zixhunywe ochungechungeni ezinye zixhunywe ngokufana.
Isekethe lapho kunendlela eyodwa kuphela yokuhamba kukagesi. Yonke imanje esekisini kufanele igeleze kuyo yonke imithwalo.
Abaqhubi nemishini esetshenziselwa ukuletha amandla kusuka ohlelweni lokuphakelwa kukagesi ohlelweni olusetshenziswayo.
Lapho ingxenye eyodwa yesekethe kagesi ihlangana nenye ingxenye yesekethe efanayo, iphambukisa ukugeleza kwamanje endleleni yayo oyifunayo.
Amasekethe kagesi (ahlanganisiwe) asebenzisa amadivayisi we-semiconductor afana nama-transistors, ama-diode nama-rectifiers alawulwa yi-silicon.
Idivayisi ye-semiconductor enokuxhumeka okuthathu, ekwazi ukukhulisa ngaphezu kokulungiswa.

Kukalwe ku-Watts. Amandla abonakala ngendlela ebonakalayo njengemisebe kagesi, amagagasi e-acoustic, noma izinto zomshini. Kwisifunda samanje esiqondile (DC), noma kumjikelezo oshintshashintshayo wamanje (i-AC) lapho impedance yakhe ingukumelana okumsulwa, amandla kagesi nawamanje asesigabeni.

Iyunithi yesilinganiso samandla asebenzayo. Izimoto zingathathwa njengengxenye ecatshangelwayo yamandla abonakalayo, noma amandla agelezela kumthwalo osebenzayo, lapho amandla wamandla namanje kucaciswa kuma-volts nama-amperes.
Iyunithi yokukala kwamandla abonakalayo. Kungumkhiqizo wamandla we-rms nama-rms wamanje.
Isilinganiso seyunithi yamandla kagesi. I-volt eyodwa ilingana nokwehluka kwamandla okungaqhuba i-ampere eyodwa yamanje ngokumelene nokuphikiswa okukodwa kwe-ohm.
Amandla we-electromotive noma \"ingcindezi\" ebangela ukugeleza kwama-electron futhi angaqhathaniswa nengcindezi yamanzi edala ukuthi amanzi agelezele epayipini. Kukalwe ngama-volts.

Ithuluzi lokulinganisa amandla kuma-volts wamandla kagesi. Lokhu ngumehluko wamandla (amandla kagesi) phakathi kwamaphoyinti ahlukene kusekethe kagesi. Ama-voltmeters anokumelana okuphezulu kwangaphakathi axhunywe ngaphesheya (ngokufana) namaphuzu lapho amandla azokalwa khona.
Iyunithi yamandla kagesi alingana nokusetshenziswa kwamandla kwe-watt eyodwa ngehora elilodwa.
Iyunithi yamandla kagesi. I-watt eyodwa ilingana ne-joule eyodwa ngomzuzwana, ehambelana namandla asesifundeni sikagesi lapho umehluko ongaba khona i-volt eyodwa ne-ampere yamanje.
I-wattmeter iyithuluzi lokulinganisa amandla kagesi (noma isilinganiso sokuphakelwa kwamandla kagesi) kuma-watts wanoma isiphi isifunda esinikeziwe.
Ukumelwa kokuqhafaza kwemijikelezo kagesi ekhombisa inani lokwehluka kwe-amplitude esikhathini esithile.

Isiteshi esincane siyingxenye yohlelo lokukhiqiza ugesi, ukudlulisa nokusabalalisa. Izinto eziguqula amandla asuka phezulu ziye phansi, noma emuva, noma zenze eminye yemisebenzi ethile ebalulekile. Phakathi kwesiteshi esikhiqizayo nomthengi, amandla kagesi angahamba ngeziteshi ezimbalwa ngamazinga kagesi ahlukene. Isiteshi singabandakanya ama-transformer ukushintsha amazinga kagesi phakathi kwamanani aphezulu wokudlulisa kanye namanani aphansi okusabalalisa, noma ekuxhumaneni kwezingcingo ezimbili zokudlulisa ezihlukile.

Isibani se-incandescent ngumthombo wokukhanya kagesi okhipha ukukhanya okukhanyayo lapho umqhubi wensimbi we-refractory (tungsten) eshubile.
- Izindleko eziphansi\n - Ukuthungela okusheshayo lapho kuvuliwe
- Ukusebenza kahle okuphansi. (iningi lamandla kagesi asetshenziswa isibani aguqulwa abe ukushisa)\n - Isikhathi esifushane sokuphila - cishe amahora ayi-1000

Isibani se-fluorescent ngumthombo wokukhanya okhipha igesi lapho ukukhishwa kukagesi emsipheni we-mercury kudala imisebe ye-ultraviolet, eguqulwa ibe ukukhanya okukhanyayo kusetshenziswa i-phosphor. Impilo yesevisi ngokwesilinganiso esiphindwe kayishumi ubude kunezibani ze-incandescent.

- Ukukhishwa okuhle kokukhanya
 - ukukhanya diffused
 - Izinhlobonhlobo zemibala ekhanyayo
 - Intengo enengqondo
- Okuqukethwe umusi weMercury\n - Imithetho ekhethekile yokulahlwa\n - Ilambu lingase libenyezele
Isibani se-halogen yisibani se-incandescent esine-buffer gas (i-halogen vapor - bromine noma iodine) efakwe ku-bulb. Lesi sici sinweba impilo yesibani ibe ngamahora angama-2000-4000.
- Ubuncane bokucwayiza okungenzeka\n - Ukucinana\n - Ukunikezwa kombala
- Ukushisa okunamandla\n - Impilo yesevisi ephansi uma iqhathaniswa neminye imithombo yokukhanya (ngaphandle kwezibani ze-incandescent).

Kumalambu e-LED, ama-LED asetshenziswa njengomthombo wokukhanya, lolu hlobo lwezibani noma amalambu asetshenziselwa ukukhanyisa kwezimboni, kwasendlini nasesitaladini. I-LED iyithuluzi le-semiconductor eline-junction ye-electron-hole edala imisebe ebonakalayo lapho amandla kagesi edlula kuyo esiya phambili.

- Impilo ende kunazo zonke izibani (kusuka emahoreni ayi-10,000 kuya kwayi-100,000)
 - Ukusetshenziswa kwamandla okuphansi
 - Yenzelwe noma iyiphi i-voltage
 - Izinhlobonhlobo zemibala ekhanyayo

Izibani ezikhipha igesi zingumndeni wemithombo yokukhanya yokufakelwa ekhiqiza ukukhanya ngokuthumela okukhipha ugesi ngegesi e-ionized, iplasma. Ngokuvamile, izibani ezinjalo zisebenzisa igesi enhle noma inhlanganisela yala magesi. Impilo yesevisi ngaphezu kwamahora ayi-10,000 ngokwesilinganiso.
- Ukusebenza kahle okuphezulu\n - Ezomnotho\n - Ukuzinza kombala okuhle

- Ukubaluleka kwegiya lokulawula
 - Ukuphuma okude kumodi yokusebenza
 - Ukubenyezela nokubhuza ngesikhathi sokusebenza
 - Imithetho ekhethekile yokulahlwa
\t Ikhebuli kagesi ukuhlangana kwentambo eyodwa noma eziningi ezisebenza eceleni noma ezigoqiwe, ezisetshenziselwa ukuthwala amandla kagesi.

● Ikhebula le-Coaxial - elisetshenziselwa amasiginali wamaza omsakazo, ngokwesibonelo ezinhlelweni zokusabalalisa ithelevishini yekhebula.
 ● Ikhebula elingcwatshwe ngqo
 ● Izintambo eziguquguqukayo
 ● Ikhebula eligcwalisiwe
 ● Ikhebula le-Heliax
 ● Ikhebuli elingashisi elenziwe ngesimbi (noma ucingo lwensimbi olungasebenzi)
 ● Ikhebula le-metallic sheathed (noma ikhebula lezikhali)
 ● Ikhebuli ye-Multicore (iqukethe izintambo ezingaphezu kweyodwa futhi imbozwe ngejazi lekhebula)
 ● Ikhebuli ebhangqiwe - Yakhiwa ngamakhondaktha amabili afakwe ngumoya avame ukusetshenziswa ezinhlelweni ze-DC noma ezinemvamisa ephansi
 ● Intambo ephathekayo - Intambo eguquguqukayo yamandla e-AC kuzinhlelo zokusebenza eziphathekayo
 ● Intambo yeribhoni - Isebenziseka lapho kudingeka izintambo eziningi. Lolu hlobo lwentambo lungaxhuma kalula, futhi lwenzelwe ukuphatha izingqinamba ezisezingeni eliphansi.
 ● Intambo evikelwe - Isetshenziselwa amasekethe abucayi kagesi noma ukuvikela kuzinhlelo zokusebenza ezinamandla amakhulu.
 Ikhebula elilodwa (ngezikhathi ezithile leli gama lisetshenziselwa ucingo)

 ● Ukuhola ngamawele - Lolu hlobo lwekhebula ulayini oyisicaba wezintambo ezimbili. Imvamisa ibizwa ngokuthi ulayini ongu-300 because ngoba ulayini unemishini engu-300 Ω. Imvamisa isetshenziswa njengolayini wokudlulisa phakathi kwe-antenna nesamukeli (isb., I-TV nomsakazo). Lezi zintambo zibhajwe ekunciphiseni imiphumela yesikhumba.
 ● Izimbili ezisontekile - Ziqukethe izintambo ezihlanganisiwe ezimbili ezifakiwe. Ifana nentambo ebhangqiwe, ngaphandle kokuthi izintambo ezibhanqiwe zisontekile.
Okokuqala udinga ukuvula ikhava yokuphuma bese uhlola i-voltage ezintanjeni eziphumayo.

\t kwamandla kagesi kuyadingeka ukuthi ubheke iphutha kulayini. Kungenzeka ukuthi ikhefu lesifunda licishiwe noma ucingo loniwe kwenye indawo.\n \t Uma i-voltage ikhona, qinisa oxhumana nabo be-wire, futhi uma kungekho zimpawu zokuncibilika koxhumana nabo esokeni, isokhethi kufanele lisebenze ngemuva kokulungisa ikhava.
\t Uma kunokuncibilika noma ukuvutha komkhondo kwikhava yokuphuma noma koxhumana nabo kufanele kuguqulwe ngokuphelele ukugwema imiphumela emibi.
Khubaza izikhangiso unomphela ngentengo yekhofi elilodwa nje

• I-Voltmeter, i-ammeter, i-ohmmeter
 • I-multimeter
 • Imitha yokuqinisa
 • Imitha kagesi
Isifaki sokusiza sokubamba ngokuphephile isipikili, isikulufa, umshudo.
Isifaki sesesekeli lapho kuqhutshwa khona isikulufa noma isipikili.
Umqhubi ofihliwe owenzelwe ukuthwala amandla kagesi. Inentambo eyodwa noma eziningi
Isendlalelo esincanyana sodaka ukuze bushelelezi ubuso bukakhonkolo
Ucezu lwentambo eguquguqukayo ifakwe ipulagi nesokhethi
Isisetshenziswa esivikelayo esiqhathanisa amandla wamandla kagesi asezintanjeni zesigaba nezingathathi hlangothi. Esimweni sokuvuza kwamanje idivayisi eyinsalela-yamanje isheshe ivule inethiwekhi.
Ikakhulukazi ucingo oluguquguqukayo. Ivumela amadivayisi eselula ukuthi axhumeke kunethiwekhi.
\t Ukuphakama kwamandla kagesi ngokweqile kuvame ukuhambisana nekhefu kumqhubi ongathathi hlangothi kunethiwekhi yokuhlinzekwa kwezigaba ezintathu.

Amafulethi 1 no-2 axhunywe ezigabeni ezahlukahlukene (i-L2 ne-L3). Uma umqhubi ongathathi hlangothi ephuka, esikhundleni sokuxhuma okufanayo, kwakhiwa uxhumano lwe-serial, okuholela ekwandeni kwamandla kagesi.
 	 Isamba semithamo yabathengi silingana namandla kagesi womugqa (U1 + U2 = 380 V).
 	 Masenze isibonelo:
 	 Efulethini lokuqala kuxhunywe iketela kuphela (P1 = 2000 W), kuthi elesibili - kube yikhompyutha kuphela (P2 = 300 W).
 	 R1 ukumelana kungu-220 ^ 2/2000 = 24.2 ohms; I-R2 ingu-220 ^ 2/300 = 161.3 Ohm
 	 Ingqikithi yamanje eyi-380 / (24.2 + 161.3) = 2.05 A
 	 Ngakho-ke, efulethini lokuqala i-voltage izolingana no-2.05 * 24.2 = 49.61 Volts. Esikhathini sesibili - 2.05 * 161.3 = 330.65 Volts
 	 Igedlela ngeke lisebenze, kepha ikhompyutha ingahluleka. Lokhu kulula ukukhumbula - umthengi onamandla amancane uzothola amandla amaningi.

\t Ungavikela indlu yakho noma indlu yakho ezimweni ezinjalo ngokufaka imodyuli yokuvikela ukuqhuma noma i-voltage relay. Lawa madivayisi wokuvikela anqamula ulayini uma i-voltage kunethiwekhi idlula okujwayelekile.

\t 4 no 5. Xhuma bese ulungisa iswishi usebenzisa izimbobo ezikhethekile ezisekelweni lweswishi kanye nebhokisi lokufaka.\n \t 6. Faka izembozo zokuvikela nokhiye. Kwenziwe!

\t Isikhungo samandla eNyukliya ukufakwa kwenuzi ukukhiqizwa kwamandla, okusebenzisa i-reactor yenuzi kanye nesethi yezinhlelo ezidingekayo, amadivayisi, imishini kanye nezakhiwo.
Isikimu sokusebenza kwesikhungo samandla enyukliya ku-opharetha wamandla wamanzi acindezelwe kabili

Amandla akhishwe kumgogodla we-reactor adluliselwe kwisipholisi esiyinhloko. Isipholisi singena ku-generator we-steam, lapho sishisa khona amanzi wesifunda sesibili siye emathunjini. Umusi oholelekayo ungena kogesi abaphendukisa ama-generator kagesi. Lapho kuphuma khona ama-turbine, umusi ungena ku-condenser, lapho upholiswa khona ngamanzi amaningi aqhamuka echibini.
 	 Isinxephezeli sengcindezi idizayini enzima futhi enzima, esebenza ukulinganisa ukuguquguquka kwengcindezi esifundeni ngesikhathi sokusebenza kwesiphenduli, okuvela ekukhulisweni okushisayo kwesipholisi.
 	 Ngaphezu kwamanzi, iziphenduli ezahlukahlukene zingasebenzisa ukuncibilika kwensimbi njengokuphatha ukushisa nokupholisa: i-sodium, lead, i-eutectic lead-bismuth alloy, njll. futhi ulahle isinxephezelo sengcindezi.
 	 Ngokuya ngohlobo lwabaphathi, inani eliphelele lamasekethe lingahluka.
 	 Esikhundleni sokusebenzisa inqolobane yamanzi, amanzi angapholiswa emibhoshongweni ekhethekile yokupholisa, okuyingxenye ebonakalayo yesitshalo samandla enuzi.

\t Isikhungo samandla esishisayo - isitshalo samandla esikhiqiza amandla kagesi ngokuguqula amandla amakhemikhali kaphethiloli ngenkathi kusetshenziswa amandla omlilo abe amandla ashisayo bese kuba amandla womshini wokuzungeza komphimbo wejeneretha kagesi. Kusetshenziswa kabanzi izinto zokubasa ezimbiwa phansi: amalahle, igesi yemvelo, uwoyela ongaphansi kakhulu, ngaphambili - i-peat ne-oil shale. Ezinye izitshalo zingasetshenziselwa ukukhiqiza ukushisa ezinhlelweni zokushisa zesifunda.

\t Ezitshalweni zamandla ezishisayo zendabuko, uphethiloli uyashiswa esithandweni sebhayela, kushisa futhi kuguqulwe kube umusi amanzi afakwe ngaphakathi kubhayela kumashubhu akhethekile (i-water tube boiler). Umusi oshisa kakhulu oshisa kakhulu onamazinga okushisa aphezulu kanye nengcindezi uphakelwa ngentambo ye-steam kukhiqizi we-turbine - i-turbine ehlanganisiwe yomusi kanye ne-generator kagesi. Kumshini we-multistage steam turbine, amandla we-steam ashisayo aguqulwa kancane kancane abe amandla wokujikeleza we-shaft lapho i-Electric Generator efakwe khona.\n \t Ezikhungweni zamandla ezishisayo eziningi, uhlelo lwegesi ephendulwa ngamandla selusabalele, lapho ingxube yamagesi ashisayo atholakala ngokushisa uphethiloli onegesi noma oketshezi ijikeleza ngqo i-turbine yesitshalo se-turbine yegesi, i-axis yayo exhunywe ku i-generator kagesi. Ngemuva kwe-turbine amagesi ahlala ashisa ngokwanele ukuthi angasetshenziswa kubhayela wokushisa imfucuza ukunika amandla injini yenjini (isitshalo esihlanganisiwe somjikelezo) noma ngenhloso yokushisa.

• Izitshalo zamandla ka-boiler ne-turbine
 - Ukujiya izitshalo zamandla
 - Ukushisa okuhlanganisiwe nezitshalo zamandla
 • Izikhungo zokuphehla ugesi ngogesi
 • Izitshalo zamandla kagesi ezijikelezayo ezihlanganisiwe
 • Izitshalo zamandla ezisuselwa ezinjini ezibuyisanayo
 - Ukucindezela ukuthungela (udizili)
 - Ngokushisa kwe-spark
 • Umjikelezo ohlanganisiwe

\t Isikhungo samandla elanga yisakhiwo sobunjiniyela esiguqula imisebe yelanga ibe ngamandla kagesi. Izindlela zokuguqula imisebe yelanga zehlukile futhi zincike ekwakhiweni kwesikhungo samandla. \t Izindawo ezihamba phambili zezitshalo zamandla elanga izindawo eziwugwadule nezomile.

Zonke izitshalo zamandla elanga zehlukaniswe ngezinhlobo eziningana:
 ● Uhlobo lombhoshongo
 ● Uhlobo lwediski
 ● Usebenzisa amamojula we-photovoltaic (amabhethri elanga)
 ● Kusetshenziswa izithambisi zokufanisa
 ● Izitshalo zamandla elanga ezihlanganisiwe
 ● Amabhaluni izitshalo zamandla elanga
 ● Izitshalo zokuphehla amandla elanga

\t Isikhungo samandla kagesi sisebenzisa njengomthombo wamandla ukunyakaza kwenqwaba yamanzi emifudlaneni yemifula kanye nokunyakaza kwamaza. Izitshalo zamandla kagesi kagesi zivame ukwakhiwa emifuleni ngokwakha amadamu nezindawo zokugcina amanzi.\n \t Ukuhlinzekwa ngamanzi okuqinisekisiwe unyaka wonke, imithambeka emikhulu yemifula, kanye nomgwaqo we-canyon - konke lokhu kuthanda ukwakhiwa kwamandla kagesi kanye namandla okuphehla ugesi.

\t Ngosizo lwezakhiwo ezibacindezela amanzi, kwenziwa ingcindezi yamanzi, engena ezincwadini zomoya ophehla amandla kagesi, eshayela ugesi ophehla amandla.\n \t Ingcindezi yamanzi edingekayo ihlinzekwa ngokwakhiwa kwamadamu noma ukusetshenziswa kokugeleza kwamanzi ngokwemvelo. Kwezinye izimo, ukuthola ingcindezi yamanzi edingekayo, idamu nokugeleza kwemvelo kusetshenziswa ndawonye.

\t Isikhungo samandla omoya (abizwa ngokuthi \"amapulazi omoya\") uchungechunge lwama-turbine omoya axhunywe kunethiwekhi eyodwa. Amapulazi amakhulu omoya angaba nemishini yomoya eyikhulu noma ngaphezulu.\n \t generator yomoya iyithuluzi lokuguqula amandla e-kinetic wokugeleza komoya abe ngamandla womshini we-turbine rotor nokuguqulwa kwayo okulandelayo kube ngamandla kagesi.

\t Isikhungo samandla kagesi siphehla amandla kagesi kusuka kumandla ashisayo avela emithonjeni engaphansi komhlaba (isibonelo, amagiza).\n \t Ukushisa komhlaba kusetshenziselwa ngqo ukushisa izindlu nezakhiwo kanye nokukhiqiza ugesi.

Iklanyelwe ukuvikela abantu ekushayweni kukagesi kanye nokuvikela izinto emlilweni uma kwenzeka umonakalo wokuvala izintambo zikagesi kanye nempahla kagesi.
Idizayinelwe ukuvikela isekethe kagesi emonakalweni obangelwe amandla amanje ngokweqile kusuka ekulayishweni okungaphezulu noma okufushane.
Yakhelwe ukuvikela izinto zikagesi emazingeni okushisa akhuphukayo.
Iklanyelwe ukuqapha inani le-voltage emisiwe, nokunqamula umthwalo uma weqa imingcele ebekiwe, uma kwenzeka kuba nezingozi kunethiwekhi kagesi.
